text: Kinective Media by United Airlines

is the first traveler
media network.

The types of use cases that we
have really been focused on are,

how can we use our data
for brands, both endemic,

such as travel brands like
hotels, rental car companies,
and also non-endemic brands

like financial services or sports
and entertainment brands.

AWS has been a pioneer
in thinking about how we can do
privacy-enhanced technology

to power these data
collaboration efforts.
We use AWS Entity Resolution

to really help bring our
customer profiles together.

AWS Entity Resolution
has provided the solution for us
to really bring that together

so that we can understand
that 360 view of the customer.

The benefit has really been
game-changing for us,

because if we think
about the customer
and their experiences,

understanding who they are across
the entirety of our customer

journey is something that we can
then provide personalized

experiences, content,
and real information

that is relevant to that customer
in that moment.

Connecting the identity resolution
now into AWS Clean Rooms

has allowed us to give that 360 view,
but then also enable the data

collaboration efforts across
strategic brands, thinking about

how they are actually going
to use our data, and then

bringing their data back
into our environment

to do closed-loop
measurement for them.

It is a non-negotiable for us
 to use AWS Clean Rooms,
though, to be able to do this,

since it provides
the privacy controls

needed to be able to work
with brands who are thinking

about their customersâ€™ privacy
first as well.

This is game-changing for both
us and our brands,

as we're able to really demonstrate
value in the market and,

in return, give our customers
the best experiences personalized

across their whole flight journey,
which then makes it important
and a win-win for both of us.
